name: When Breads Fly (LowQuality Games)
description:
You know that one thought that always comes to mind, the one where you wish there was a game just about bread, nothing else. Yes, that one.

Well, thought no more! It's a flipping game!

Just run and jump in this mobile-based browser sandbox! 

If you like it, add it to your home screen!

Controls

Tap/click above Bread to jump

Tap/click left to walk left

Tap/click right to walk right

Credits

Game concept: Robert

Vocals: Cruz

Backtrack: Samuel

Platforms

Phone: iOS, Android

Computer: Windows, Mac, Linux

Console: Xbox, Playstation and others that have some form of internet browser
